Text: It took me VERY long to get this, so since I'm not seeding 24/7, keep the torrent in your queue and be patient. And please seed.
as in your one key let you play 9 GFWL games online, or you could use it to get the achievements but not play the games online?

I used ONE key and I can play NINE games online. I've used it for GoW, The Club, Halo 2, DoW II etc. etc. I used one key and it gave me full functionality for all the games I activated. Achievements, online gameplay, rank, stats, voice chat, everything. When you copy a key at gamestop, enter it in your phone, but make it look like your texting a friend about the game. Remember 5 of the letters/numbers, turn the game on the backside, type the 5 characters *making it look like your typing info on the back* and your good to go. Gamestop wont bother you they always think youre trying to get your friend to buy a game too so theyre like Yay!

This patch WORKS!
Here is a quick guide on how to set-it-up, you will need:

Search for "Dawn of War 2 WiCKED" on Google and pick one!
Patch 1.5
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5051729/Dawn_of_War_2_1.5.0_Update
Patch 1.8
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5341342/Warhammer_40_000_Dawn_of_War_II_Patch_1.8
Patch 1.9
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5339521/Warhammer_40_000_Dawn_of_War_II_Patch_Hotfix_1.9

#1.1 - Install/or unrar your game.
#1.2 - Extract all 1.8 patch data into your game's installation folder.
#1.3 - Open 1.5 patch folder and extract "RevLoader-2.2_New_DLLs" to your game's installation folder.
#1.4 - Copy all 1.9 patch data over into your game's installation folder.
#1.5 - Launch the game from your game's installation folder, use Loader.exe
#1.6 - Press "HOME", create an offline Xlive profile and play the game!

--- --- --- --- --- --- --- xISSUES WHEN LAUNCHING YOUR GAMEx --- --- --- --- --- --- ---

#2.1 - Re-install your game.
#2.2 - Extract all 1.8 patch data into your game's installation folder.
#2.3 - Open 1.5 patch folder and extract "RevLoader-2.2_New_DLLs" to your game's installation folder.
#2.4 - Launch the game from your game's installation folder, use Loader.exe
#2.5 - Press "HOME", create an offline Xlive profile and LOG OFF.
#2.6 - Now apply all 1.9 patch data over into your game's installation folder.

#2.7 - Launch the game from your game's installation folder, use Loader.exe
#2.8 - Now you may finally play the game!

/a fellow pirate
